Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class SplitRequest

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.SplitRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
@Private class SplitRequest extends Object implements Runnable
Handles processing region splits. Put in a queue, owned by HRegionServer.
